discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A Loadbalancer distributes incoming traffic among a set of servers.

DRG is used to connect OCI to on prem or for VCN peering.
IGW is used to provide internet connectivity to PUBLIC subnets.
Auto scaling is closely tied to load balancing and helps scale instances(servers) up and down based on load or other metrics(automating load balancing action).
Load Balancer, yes A.
"A" is the correct

questions.question_text: What does Oracle's Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) attestation of compliance provide to customers?

choices.C: Customers can use these services for workloads that store, process, or transmit cardholder data.
choices.D: Customers can use these services for workloads that process, or transmit cardholder data but not store it.
choices.B: Customers can use these services for workloads to process applications for credit card approval securely.
choices.A: Customers can use these services for workloads that provides validation of card holder transaction but only as 3rd party vendor.

discussion.content:
Answer is C:

Effective May 1, 2018, Oracle has received a Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) Attestation of Compliance (AoC) covering Oracle Cloud Infrastructure services.

Oracle Cloud Infrastructure provides Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) that enables customers to build, deploy and maintain reliable, secure, scalable environments. As a PCI Level 1 Service Provider, customers can now use these services for workloads that store, process or transmit cardholder data.

Selected Answer: C
Answer is C

Selected Answer: C

Oracle Cloud Infrastructure provides Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) that enables customers to build, deploy and maintain reliable, secure, scalable environments. As a PCI Level 1 Service Provider, customers can now use these services for workloads that store, process or transmit cardholder data.

From: https://blogs.oracle.com/cloud-infrastructure/oracle-announces-pci-dss-attestation-of-compliance-aoc-for-oracle-cloud-infrastructure
